seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior designation, substantial responsibilities but no explicit senior-level requirements or years of experience specified

job_family.evidence: Title is explicitly 'Data Engineer' with core responsibilities focused on data warehousing, ELT pipelines, data integration, and data modeling

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on ELT pipelines, automated data processing, data warehousing solutions with technologies like Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, and DBT for batch transformations

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of direct reports, team management, or leadership responsibilities; focus on individual contribution, collaboration, and technical execution

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned multiple times including 'AWS cloud infrastructure' and 'AWS CDK' as required skills

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS mentioned among cloud providers; BigQuery and Redshift mentioned but as data warehouse technologies, not primary cloud platforms

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ELT pipelines, automated data processing, and CI/CD practices with no real-time or streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Jenkins mentioned for CI automation but no specific data orchestration tools like Airflow, Dagster, or similar are mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: Explicit focus on data warehousing solutions with Snowflake, BigQuery, and Redshift mentioned as core cloud data platforms

remote_restriction.evidence: UK-only restriction stated with hybrid model requiring minimum 50% office time, indicating need to be physically present in UK

timezone_focus.evidence: UK-based company with offices in Manchester, London, and Bristol, indicating UK/Europe timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model with 50% office requirement and UK-only restriction implies need to relocate to UK for non-UK residents

h1b_friendly.evidence: UK-based company with no visa sponsorship mentioned; H1B is US-specific visa not applicable to UK work authorization

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: UK-based company context makes US student visa programs (OPT/CPT) not applicable; no mention of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned; focus on ability to work in UK without specific immigration status restrictions

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent employee position with comprehensive benefits package indicates employment contract structure

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including competitive salary, pension matching up to 6%, private healthcare, bonus scheme, share awards, training budget, and 25-31 days PTO

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'continuous learning', 'talent development programmes', and 'ongoing technical training' but no specific career progression paths or advancement tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'dynamic and experienced Data Engineering team' and collaboration with stakeholders, implying working with experienced professionals

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No specific promotion, advancement, or career progression paths mentioned in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned; only general development programmes referenced

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have technical skills and nice-to-have skills like AI tools, with balanced mix of requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically for data engineering role with well-defined responsibilities and clear technical requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements appear reasonable for mid-level data engineer role with appropriate mix of technical and soft skills
